full_text:
EPSTEIN #76318-054
From [b(6); (b)(7)(C)@pbso.org
To [b(6); (b)(7)(C)@pbso.org
Date 2019/08/21 15:17
Subject: EPSTEIN #76318-054
Attachments: TEXT.htm
Hi [b(6); (b)(7)(C),
I apologize if this is a duel email. I am one of the BOP attorneys at MCC New York. My supervisor, [b(6); (b)(7)(C),
[b(6); (b)(7)(C) was going to reach out to you to see if you could get us records from Epstein's prior case in Florida [b(6); (b)(7)(C) is out of the office until next Thursday, so I was asked to follow-up. Specifically, we are looking for any mental health records or information you had on Epstein, as well as his Presentence Investigation Report (or paperwork that would have the same type of information). If you have any documentation or can put me in touch with someone who may be able to assist, I would greatly appreciate it.
Please feel free to contact me at 646-836-[b(6); (b)(7)(C) to discuss, and thank you for your cooperation.
Best,
[b(6); (b)(7)(C)
[b(6); (b)(7)(C)
Staff Attorney
CLC New York
Metropolitan Correctional Center
150 Park Row
New York, NY 10007
p: 646-836-[b(6); (b)(7)(C)
f: 646-836-7665
Page 2036
DOJ-OGR-00025199
